targets.expr: topk(10, bottomk(10, sum by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_contributor_count{organization_name=~"$organization|jerseymikes", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}))) or vector(0)

panels.title: Average Time to Merge by Repository

panels.description: Based on data collected every 2 hours
panels.title: Merge Time Trend (Based on Sparse 2h Data)
Repositories with Longest Average Merge Times

targets.expr: count by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_change_time_to_merge_seconds{vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}) / count by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_ref_count{vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}) * 100 or vector(0)

avg(sum by(vcs_repository_name) (cicd_pipeline_run_completed{result="success", organization_name=~"$organization", team_name=~"$team", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}) / sum by(vcs_repository_name) (cicd_pipeline_run_completed{organization_name=~"$organization", team_name=~"$team", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"})) * 100

panels.description: Repositories with highest pipeline failure rates

targets.expr: (1 - (sum by(vcs_repository_name) (cicd_pipeline_run_completed{result="success", organization_name=~"$organization", team_name=~"$team", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}) / sum by(vcs_repository_name) (cicd_pipeline_run_completed{organization_name=~"$organization", team_name=~"$team", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}))) * 100

panels.title: Pipeline Failure Hot Spots

panels.description: Repositories with high activity but few contributors - potential knowledge silos that represent business risk

targets.expr: bottomk(5, count by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_ref_count{vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"})) and topk(5, sum by(vcs_repository_name) (rate(vcs_change_time_to_merge_seconds{vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}[12h]))) or vector(0)

panels.title: High Activity / Low Contributor Repositories

panels.description: Average age of branches in days
panels.title: Average Branch Age

panels.description: Total number of open pull requests
panels.title: Open Pull Requests

panels.description: Average time pull requests are open
panels.title: Average PR Age

panels.description: Monitoring build times for repositories. Thresholds: Warning 15min (900s), Critical 30min (1800s)
panels.title: Average Build Time by Repository

panels.description: 95th and 50th percentile build times. Target: <15min for optimal developer productivity.
panels.title: Build Time SLO (p95 and p50)
Repositories with Longest Average Merge Times

targets.expr: topk(5, max by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_contributor_count{organization_name=~"$organization|jerseymikes", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"})) or vector(0)

panels.description: Estimates how many developers would need to leave to significantly impact the project. Higher values indicate less risk from developer departure.

targets.expr: sum by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_contributor_count{organization_name=~"$organization|jerseymikes", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"}) / (1 + stddev by(vcs_repository_name) (vcs_ref_lines_delta{organization_name=~"$organization|jerseymikes", vcs_repository_name=~"$repo"})) or vector(0)

panels.title: Bus Factor Estimate by Repository (Higher is Better)

list.description: The organization name resource attribute for metrics
list.label: Organization
list.name: organization

title: Jersey Mikes - Comprehensive GitLab Metrics Dashboard
